statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Mickell Gladness had 13 blocked shots for Alabama A&M in its 86-66 victory Monday night over Texas Southern, a strong follow-up to his NCAA-record 16 blocks on Saturday.
article.headline: Alabama A&M's Gladness totals 29 blocks in two games
article.linkText: Alabama A&M's Gladness totals 29 blocks in two games
article.story: HUNTSVILLE, Ala. -- Mickell Gladness had 13 blocked shots for Alabama A&M in its 86-66 victory Monday night over Prairie View A&M, a strong follow-up to his NCAA-record 16 blocks on Saturday. Gladness also had 13 points and Trant Simpson led Alabama A&M with a game-high 25 points and seven rebounds for the Bulldogs (10-18, 4-12 Southwestern Athletic Conference). Simpson scored the Bulldogs' first points on a layup less than a minute into the game and never let the Panthers (7-10, 5-11 SWAC) take the lead. Along with Simpson and Gladness, the Bulldogs had three other double digit scorers: Cornelius Hester with 20 points, Jonathan Inman with 13 and Evan Hilton with 12. Inman and Hilton also had seven rebounds each. Derek Johnson led Prairie View A&M with 15 points and Dominique Sharpe added 10. Brian Ezeh snagged 10 rebounds. Alabama A&M shot 56.9 percent from the floor and outrebounded Prairie View A&M 39-36.
